PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-01302019-02-28,  FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 11
PrecisRegulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS, NO. 11 in order to (1) modify existing GST/HST regulations made under the Excise Tax Act to clarify the longstanding policy intent of certain rules; (2) make housekeeping amendments; and, (3) make consequential amendments in response to changes to the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0059 Publication Date: 2019-03-20
AttachmentsAttachment
